title: [Large-scale] Computational Fluid Dynamics Module Redesign: Cognitive Apprenticeship-Based Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental fluid mechanics theory and numerical analysis
context.additional_context: Real-time interactive educational environment using digital devices for advanced domain-expert citizens

learning_goals: Learners can explain the mathematical modeling process of CFD (Computational Fluid Dynamics) simulations with 80% accuracy.
Learners can set boundary conditions by applying discretization methods of the Navier-Stokes equations with a 90% success rate over three practical sessions.
Learners can configure fluid dynamics analysis cases using OpenFOAM or ANSYS Fluent and evaluate the physical validity of results with 85% accuracy in two assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
